author: stsp
msg: Make parameters for svn_apply_autoprops.py configurable,
fixing TODO number 2 listed at the top of this file.
The working copy path was hardcoded to the current working directory.
Add an optional WC_PATH argument to override this.
The configuration file path was hardcoded to ~/.subversion/config.
This file affects all svn clients and settings for all working copies.
In some situations users might want to use a different configuration file
to configure a specific set of autoprops, so add a new --config option.
* contrib/client-side/svn_apply_autoprops.py
(): Import getopt.
(SVN_CONFIG_FILENAME): Expand vars (i.e. $HOME) at point of definition.
(PROGNAME): New. Basename of argv[0].
(usage): New helper function. Prints usage information which contains text
that was previously sitting in a comment at the top of the file.
(main): Parse options with getopt. In addition to the --config option
described above, accept --help and -h options that print usage text.
Error out if the config file cannot be opened.
Accept an optional WC_PATH argument to override the default ('.').
Error out if too many arguments were passed.
